name: 04-databasesessions
description: - create project folder - `npm init`     - answer the quetions   - this creates the `package.json` file - `eslint --init`   - answer the questions - `npm install mysql express ejs`   - add express dependancy to the package.json file   - creates the `node_modules` folder   - remember `.gitignore` !
